divs: Sighting Detailscoming out of store looked up seen small plane with something under it #1 when looking at that four bright orange yellow round lights flashed on hovering in the air all planes moving but lights not moving then turned off seen black object hovering then lights came on again then went out never at the same time went out , you can see an object sitting in the sky broad daylight when it wanted to it would disappear and reappear ,watch it for 15- twenty minutes trying to get closer to get beter look on foot .ask person walking across parkinglot how many light did they seee they said four .these lights where bright and not far away .after alot of helicopters where flying around ,went home to get caera and girlfriend when i returned watched but nothing wss there any mor but still alot of helicopters with flashing lights
trends: There has been one other sighting in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around October 29th 2010
